all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And thou must open thy mouth at all times, declaring my gospel with the sound of rejoicing. Amen.
Doctrine and Covenants 28:16
Quote of the Day
"We can confidently disregard brokenness in any way disqualifying us from heavenly love."
Karl D. Hirst | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
